text: Simone Nassar Tebet (; born 27 February 1970) is a Brazilian lawyer, professor, writer, and politician. She has represented Mato Grosso do Sul in the Federal Senate since 2015. She was mayor of TrÃªs Lagoas from 2005 to 2010. She is a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement Party. Tebet came in third place for President of Brazil in the 2022 election. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian lawyers Category:Brazilian writers Category:Brazilian educators Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Politicians from Mato Grosso do Sul Category:Brazilian mayors
